prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：Streaming Volumetric Images Online 与 mpeg vpcc gpcc 的关系和差别?

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Streaming Volumetric Images Online, was published on 2018. (It can be cite this paper as Jamhoury, 2018 on your answer). 
- An overview of ongoing point cloud compression standardization activities: video-based (V-PCC) and geometry-based (G-PCC), was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Graziosi et al., 2020 on your answer).
response: 你和 Kimi 的对话超过 20 万字了，开启一个新会话可以接着聊。
quection: 基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：Streaming Volumetric Images Online 与 mpeg vpcc gpcc 的关系和差别?
